rooms.description: Wide entrance hall with reception area and cloakroom. Designed to adhere to Vastu principles by aligning the main door in the south-west direction.
Spacious living room with seating area and entertainment unit. Openable windows on the eastern side to invite morning light as per Vastu guidelines.
Dining area adjacent to the living room. Optimized for family gatherings with proper ventilation and natural lighting from the south direction.
Modern kitchen layout designed to face east, ensuring efficient workflow and positive energy flow as per Vastu principles.
A small pantry adjacent to the kitchen for storage. Designed with south-east facing windows.
Guest washroom located near the entrance. Windows oriented towards north-west to allow proper light and fresh air.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Large windows on the eastern side to maximize natural light and ensure proper ventilation.
Strategically placed windows for sunlight penetration as per Vastu norms.
Balcony access door ensuring connection with the outdoor garden area and swimming pool view.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom. Placed in the north-east corner to ensure privacy and favorable Vastu alignment.
Additional bedroom with natural light from the south-east facing windows as per Vastu guidelines.
Third bedroom designed to ensure proper airflow and privacy. Openable windows on the north side.
Second master bedroom featuring a private balcony with south facing aspect for natural illumination in accordance with Vastu practices.
En-suite bathroom attached to the master bedroom ensuring convenience and adherence to privacy standards.

openings.description: North-east facing windows to bring in morning light and positive energy as per Vastu guidelines.
Balcony access door for master bedroom 2, offering scenic view of the garden and swimming pool.
Open terrace providing panoramic view of the surroundings and swimming pool, designed with a slight inclination to facilitate rainwater drainage.
A well-designed swimming pool located in the southeast corner of the plot, ensuring privacy and compliance with local building norms.
